audio_item.dc.title: Sound Recording - Dr. Benjamin E. Mays; Dr. Hiram Weld - 1956 August 05, 1956 August 12
audio_item.dc.contributor.author: Crane, Henry Hitt

audio_item.dc.description: Content note: The sound recording(s) associated with this repository item derive from a single audio reel tape. A single tape may yield multiple audio files if there were variations in tape stock, speed, or channels (i.e. stereo or mono). For more information see http://deepblue.lib.umich.edu/handle/2027.42/108126.
audio_item.dc.abstract: [Side 1] : Dr. Benjamin E. Mays, “Everywhere I Turn I Meet Jesus” : Recording of Dr. Benjamin E. Mays and Dr. Hiram Weld; August 5, 1956 Track 1 Benjamin E. Mays, “Everywhere I Turn I Meet Jesus” Dr. and August 12, 1956 Track 2 Dr. Hiram Weld; contains a paper program from the Church.

[Side 2] : Dr. Hiram Weld, ["Living the Humble Life"] : Recording of Dr. Hiram Weld and Dr. Benjamin E. Mays sermons: August 5, 1956 Track 1 Benjamin E. Mays, “Everywhere I Turn I Meet Jesus” Dr. and August 12, 1956 Track 2 Dr. Hiram Weld; contains a paper program from the Church.
